Segment.name: PYT
Segment.comment: To specify payment terms provided by a vendor to an entity over a historical period

Field.name: TermsNetDays
Field.comment: Number of days until total invoice amount is due (discount not applicable)

Field.name: TermsTypeCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment terms

Field.name: DayOfMonth
Field.comment: The numeric value of the day of the month between 1 and the maximum day of the month being referenced

Field.name: TermsDiscountPercent1
Field.comment: Terms discount percentage, expressed as a percent, available to the purchaser if an invoice is paid on or before the Terms Discount Due Date

Field.name: TermsDiscountPercent2
Field.comment: Terms discount percentage, expressed as a percent, available to the purchaser if an invoice is paid on or before the Terms Discount Due Date

Field.name: TermsTypeCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment terms

Field.name: TermsDiscountDaysDue1
Field.comment: Number of days in the terms discount period by which payment is due if terms discount is earned

Field.name: TermsDiscountDaysDue2
Field.comment: Number of days in the terms discount period by which payment is due if terms discount is earned

SyntaxNote.name: R0102
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of PYT01 or PYT02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0302
SyntaxNote.comment: If PYT03 is present, then PYT02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0504
SyntaxNote.comment: If PYT05 is present, then PYT04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0604
SyntaxNote.comment: If PYT06 is present, then PYT04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0807
SyntaxNote.comment: If PYT08 is present, then PYT07 is required.
